name: resume-generator
description: TypeScript-based resume generator with configurable templates

scripts.generate: npm run build && node dist/cli.js generate
scripts.generate:all: npm run build && node dist/cli.js all
scripts.start: npm run build && node dist/cli.js dev
scripts.serve: npm run build && node dist/cli.js dev
scripts.clean: npm run build && node dist/cli.js clean --all
scripts.clean:resumes: npm run build && node dist/cli.js clean --resumes
scripts.list: npm run build && node dist/cli.js list
scripts.info: npm run build && node dist/cli.js info

author: Thomas Robert Butler IV
